parent_disease: Early infantile developmental and epileptic encephalopathy
reasoning: Epileptic encephalopathy, early infantile, 41 (EIEE41) is an extremely rare genetic subtype of early infantile epileptic encephalopathy. General EIEE incidence estimated at 1 per 50,000-100,000 births. EIEE41 represents a specific genetic subtype among the 60+ identified EIEE types, estimated incidence <1 per 100,000 births based on genetic epidemiology. Limited epidemiological data available; estimate based on general EIEE incidence rates.
source: Orphanet Early infantile developmental and epileptic encephalopathy (ORPHA:1934), Epilepsy Foundation
